column1: 37910722$Ascension Sky Dragon$$LIGHT$[Dragon/synchro]$$$$$10$0$3000$$1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$$If this card is Synchro Summoned: It gains 800 ATK for each card currently in your hand. When this card you control is destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to your GY
column2: if all of the monsters that were used for the Synchro Summon of this card are in your GY: You can Special Summon all of them
column3: but their effects are negated. You can only use this effect of "Ascension Sky Dragon" once per turn.$$$$$
